snippet.title: The making of Llorona: How to win a Game Jam | INDIE DEVBLOG
snippet.description:
This is pretty much a devlog about how I made my game Llorona and how I managed to win the Latinos Unidos Gamejam 2020 thanks to it. In this devlog I talk about the research I did, the horror elements, the spooks and scares, the story behind the game folklore, I went into a little detail about how I did the ps1 textures, and how I put everything together in the godot engine. I also thank the friends that helped me and show a little bit of what I'm working right now.

Remember to subscribe and follow me on my socials:
twiiter: @gamedevboi
IG: gamdevboi_
